name: BNNS.UnaryLayer
desc: The base class for layers that accept a single input.

items.name: func apply(batchSize: Int, input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Applies the layer to a set of input objects, writing the result to a set of output objects.

items.name: func applyBackward(batchSize: Int, input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, outputGradient: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, generatingInputGradient: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Applies the layer backward to generate input gradients.
